language

Class BadWordCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • language.BadWordCheck

  • public class BadWordCheck
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to check strings for words listed in the black listed words text file
    Version:
    3.8 (02.06.15)
    Author:
    Copyright (c) 2015 EyeHouse Ltd. All rights reserved.

    • Method Detail

      • openFile

        public void openFile()
        This method opens the black listed words file.

      • closeFile

        public void closeFile()
        This method closes the black listed words file.

      • checkforBlackListedWords

        public boolean checkforBlackListedWords(java.lang.String inputText)
        This method checks if a single word contains a word listed in the black listed words file.
        Parameters:
        inputText - The word that the will be checked against the black listed words file.
        Returns:
        Whether a word contains a word stored in the black listed words file. True if it does, false if it matches no word in the black listed words file.

      • locateBadWords

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> locateBadWords(java.lang.String inputText)
        Locates and returns the location of a black listed word within the inputed string.
        Parameters:
        inputText - Sentence that will have its black listed words located.
        Returns:
        A list of the locations, 0 meaning no black listed words were found, 1 being the first word.

      • highlightBlackListedWords

        public java.lang.String highlightBlackListedWords(java.lang.String inputText)
        Locates and returns the original inputed string but amended to have brackets (eg. []) around black listed words.
        Parameters:
        inputText - Sentence that will have its black listed words located and highlighted
        Returns:
        The sentence that has its black listed words located and highlighted

      • containsBlackListedWords

        public boolean containsBlackListedWords(java.lang.String inputText)
        Determines whether a black listed word is located somewhere within the inputed sentence.
        Parameters:
        inputText - Sentence that will be checked for black listed words.
        Returns:
        True if black listed word located, false if not.
